name: node
description: 1. Install **Node.js** https://nodejs.org/en/download/ 2. Install **VS code** https://code.visualstudio.com/download 3. Download **bootcamp-template** project. 4. Open the project folder in **VS code**  5. Open terminal (shortcut: **ctrl+`**) 6. Run the following command: `> npm install`\ The project packages are now installed in the **node_modules** folder.  7. Run the following command: `> npm start`\ Now your project is running at http://localhost:8080/. \ Use this command to run the project next time. 8. create your own repository for this project, ans set up the origin on your project. 9. add me as a contributor in your github repo. ***chanakamin***
